short_summary: MANDAT FOR THE STUDY OF SYNTHESIS OF KNOWLEDGE BY THE KIX ON EQUALITY OF GENDER IN AND BY EDUCATION
description: International Development Research Centre is requesting proposals for a Policy Advisory Services Consultant to synthesize the knowledge of the KIX on Gender Equality in and through Education. The consultant will be required to produce a syntheses report based on KIX projects and according to the specifications document. Consult the attached documents for this project. .
